fourChestPopup.title: Welcome Bonus!
fourChestPopup.message: As one of our earliest users, you’ve unlocked a special reward chest! Claim it now before it disappears.

countdownChestPopup.infoContent:
You can claim one chest every 24 hours when the countdown ends. After claiming, the timer resets for another 24 hours.

When you open a Level 3 or Level 4 chest, you'll get a Boost Link that can be shared with friends. Each valid assist grants both you and the helper rewards:
  • Level 3 Chest: +1 hour speed boost and GEM ×50
  • Level 4 Chest: +2 hours speed boost and GEM ×100
Each link is valid for 12 hours and can be used up to 12 times. After that, it will expire automatically.

You may also receive Promo Boost from other users' chest activity. If you have an active countdown, this assist will automatically reduce your time based on the chest they open.

Chest LevelTier 1 BoostTier 2 Boost
Level 110 minutes5 minutes
Level 230 minutes15 minutes
Level 31 hour30 minutes
Level 412 hours6 hours

Note: Telegram Star auto-claim feature is not yet available.
countdownChestPopup.oddContent:
Each time you claim a countdown chest, one of the following chest types will be randomly granted:
  • LV1 Chest – 60% chance (Most common)
  • LV2 Chest – 28% chance (Uncommon)
  • LV3 Chest – 10% chance (Rare)
  • LV4 Chest – 2% chance (Very rare)
Higher level chests offer a better chance of receiving rarer fragments and larger amounts of gems.

Here's a general idea of the kind of rewards each chest may contain:
  • LV1: Green fragments and a small chance at blue
  • LV2: Blue fragments and possibly purple
  • LV3: Blue, purple, and sometimes gold fragments
  • LV4: Guaranteed purple and gold fragments, and high gem rewards

Note: Item probabilities and reward contents may be adjusted over time to improve game balance.

jackpotInfoOverlay.title: Jackpot Chest
jackpotInfoOverlay.description: The Jackpot Chest rewards players for daily activity. By performing key actions, you help grow the TON Jackpot pool.
jackpotInfoOverlay.contributeDesc: Actions like registration and chest opening add TON to the pool.
jackpotInfoOverlay.triggerDesc: Once the pool is full, the next chest opened instantly wins the Jackpot.
jackpotInfoOverlay.tiersDesc: Higher levels offer bigger rewards and include multiple contribution types.
jackpotInfoOverlay.note: Note: Jackpot rules and rewards may change to keep the system balanced.
